Help Hank help...

Your workflow

Sometimes finding the information you need to assign all of the proper codes and modifiers to a case can be time consuming.

Let Hank help! Send Hank the record, and he'll scan it for you and provide a list of the most likely codes and modifiers highlighting the text that contributed to his decisions.

In return, you will help Hank by correcting him when he gets it wrong and explaining with free text why his selection was incorrect. In this way, Hank will learn from his mistakes in near real time.

Learn more

Help Hank help...

Your peers

You've already learned about Hank's profit sharing plan. Work for Hank, and he'll work for you. Well, there's one more way you can work for Hank beyond providing your feedback.

Recruit your peers to benefit from Hank's profit sharing model, and your share in Hank's profits will grow in accordance to the quality and quantity of their feedback.

Sign Up

Help Hank help...

Your bottom line

Hank's not hiding anything. Eventually, he'll have gathered enough feedback to get it right as often as his human trainers. Oddly enough, that's what we should all be working toward. Why?

Because when Hank profits, you, his trainers, profit as well. For up to 7 years, you will be paid a portion of every dollar generated by the models you helped to train.

Pursuing your dreams, or getting a head start on retirement? That's something we should all be able to get behind.

Learn more
